amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds to allow categorical eligibility for the supplemental nutrition assistance program.

action.text: Amendment SA 810 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 58. Record Vote Number: 182.

Amendment SA 810 proposed by Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6741-6744; text: CR S6742) To prohibit the use of funds to allow categorical eligibility for the supplemental nutrition assistance program.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 810 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 58. Record Vote Number: 182.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 810 under the order of 10/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 58. Record Vote Number: 182.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 810 proposed by Senator Sessions to Amendment SA 738.
